description:
Ticket to Ride® has arrived at Platform Nintendo Switch™!

Discover a fresh adaptation of the iconic board game in stunning 3D. Join friends, family and fans around the world for a journey like no other. Build a railway empire that connects the most popular cities, claim the most exciting routes and dominate your competitors in this fan-favourite classic!

INCLUDES:
SINGLE-PLAYER MODE DRIVEN BY EXPERT AIs – Powered by an innovative adaptive AI system, single-player mode offers a challenge for new and experienced players alike. 
A TRULY SOCIAL TAKE ON MULTIPLAYER – Revolutionary tech enables a new online multiplayer system, which offers seamless match-making and a truly social experience. 
AN IMMERSIVE EXPERIENCE – Every moment has been brought to life with beautiful graphics that will immerse you in the adventure. 
STRATEGIC GAMEPLAY – Every game presents fresh challenges, and it’s your mission to work out the most efficient solutions. Collect points by completing tickets, linking destinations and building the longest route.
ONLY THE BEGINNING… – Build your railway network through North America and Europe, and prepare for new expansions! 

Contains:
Ticket to Ride® Base Game – the fan-favourite train-adventure game that started it all!
The European Expansion – includes the Europe map, two additional characters, two additional trains and two additional carriages.
name: Ticket to Ride
intro: Get ready to build your railway empire!
